Question: The ____–McCartney songwriting partnership yielded eight of its fourteen tracks.
Hints: This person's playing of a mouth organ during a bus journey to visit his cousin in Scotland caught the driver's ear.
This person also contributed "I'm the Greatest", to Starr's album Ringo (1973), released the same month.
This person and Ono attended the opening night performance, their second public appearance together to date.
